name: CVG_SUBSCR_EMPR_ADDR
description: This table contains each coverage subscriber's employer address.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SUBSCR_EMPR_ADDR
columns.description: The street address of the subscriber's employer associated with the coverage record.
